rules.description: If there is a custom method in the rules, you need to use the setRules method to set the rules, as described above
rules.description_zh: 通过ref设置，如果rules中有自定义方法等，需要使用setRules方法设置规则，见上方说明

errorType.description: The error prompt method is described above
errorType.description_zh: 错误的提示方式，见上方说明

borderBottom.description: Whether to display the underlined borders of the form fields
borderBottom.description_zh: 是否显示表单域的下划线边框

labelPosition.description: The position of the form field hint text, left-left, top-top
labelPosition.description_zh: 表单域提示文字的位置，left-左侧，top-上方

labelWidth.description: The width of the prompt text, in px

labelAlign.description: The alignment of the lable font

methods.name: validate
methods.description: A method for validating the entire form
methods.description_zh: 对整个表单进行校验的方法

methods.name: setRules
methods.description: Call this method to set the validation rule
methods.description_zh: 调用此方法，设置校验规则

methods.name: validateField
methods.description_zh: 对部分表单字段进行校验

methods.name: resetFields
methods.description: Reset the entire form, reset all field values to their default values, and remove the validation results
methods.description_zh: 对整个表单进行重置，将所有字段值重置为初始值并移除校验结果
